welcome.title: Welcome to snakecase.sh
welcome.subtitle: GitHub-Native Messaging for Developers
welcome.description: Connect, collaborate, and communicate with your team using secure, encrypted messaging built for the GitHub ecosystem.

items.title: End-to-End Encryption
items.description: All messages are encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption, ensuring your conversations remain private and secure.

items.title: GitHub Integration
items.description: Seamlessly authenticate with your GitHub account and connect with your repositories and teams.

items.title: Real-Time Messaging
items.description: Send and receive messages instantly with real-time updates and notifications.

items.title: Repository Conversations
items.description: Organize conversations around your repositories and collaborate with your team in context.

items.title: Privacy Focused
items.description: We don't sell your data. Your privacy is our priority, with full GDPR and CCPA compliance.

items.title: Developer-Friendly
items.description: Built by developers, for developers, with a focus on productivity and ease of use.

legal.title: Before You Get Started
legal.description: Please review and accept our terms to continue using snakecase.sh.

termsOfService.label: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service
termsOfService.summary: By using snakecase.sh, you agree to our terms including user eligibility (13+ years), acceptable use policies, and our rights to moderate content and terminate accounts for violations.

privacyPolicy.label: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.summary: We collect your GitHub profile information and message data. All messages are encrypted with AES-256-GCM. We don't sell your data and comply with GDPR and CCPA regulations.

communityGuidelines.label: I will follow the Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.summary: Our community values respect, inclusivity, and collaboration. Harassment, spam, illegal content, and violations may result in warnings, temporary restrictions (jail), or permanent bans.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines Summary
communityGuidelines.description: Help us maintain a safe and welcoming community for everyone.

rules.title: Be Respectful
rules.description: Treat all users with kindness and courtesy. Use welcoming language and respect different viewpoints.

rules.title: No Harassment
rules.description: Zero tolerance for harassment, hate speech, discrimination, threats, or personal attacks of any kind.

rules.title: No Spam
rules.description: Don't send repetitive messages, unsolicited advertising, phishing attempts, or automated bot activity.

rules.title: No Illegal Content
rules.description: Strictly prohibited: illegal activities, violence, child exploitation, fraud, copyright violations, or harmful content.

rules.title: Report Violations
rules.description: Use the report button or email abuse@snakecase.sh to report violations. We treat all reports confidentially.

rules.title: Enforcement
rules.description: Violations may result in warnings, temporary restrictions (jail), or permanent account bans depending on severity.

levels.title: Warning
levels.description: First-time or minor violations typically receive a formal warning notification.

levels.title: Jail (Temporary Restriction)
levels.description: Moderate violations or repeated minor violations result in temporary account suspension (24 hours to 30 days).

levels.title: Ban (Permanent Termination)
levels.description: Severe violations result in permanent account termination with all access revoked.

items.question: What data do we collect?
items.answer: We collect your GitHub profile information (username, email, avatar), message content, and basic usage data to provide and improve our service.

items.question: How are messages encrypted?
items.answer: All messages are encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption, a military-grade encryption standard. We cannot read your encrypted messages.

items.question: Do you sell my data?
items.answer: No. We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

items.question: Can I export or delete my data?
items.answer: Yes. You have the right to export your data in a machine-readable format and request deletion of your account and data at any time.

items.question: Are you GDPR/CCPA compliant?
items.answer: Yes. We fully comply with GDPR (for European users) and CCPA (for California residents), giving you control over your personal information.

items.question: What cookies do you use?
items.answer: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management, analytics cookies to improve our service, and preference cookies to remember your settings.
